dcterms:creator: wwPDB consortium
dcterms:description: A curated subset of the Protein Data Bank (PDB) used for developing machine learning-based scoring functions. The 2016 edition consists of 13,308 protein-ligand binding complexes, organized into general, refined, and core subsets based on criteria such as ligand molecular weight, binding data quality, and crystal structure resolution.
dcterms:title: PDBBind 2016
